 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺץ‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹץ‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Isa.29.5|Isa 29:5]]</sup> ==chaff== (Talmud [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺצָא‎</span>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***straw*** ); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> absolute [[Hos.13.3|Hos 13:3]] + 6 t.; construct [[Isa.17.13|Isa 17:13]] — ***chaff***, always as driven by wind, and always with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּ‎</span>, in simile; of wicked [[Job.21.18|Job 21:18]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ תֶּבֶן לִפְנֵי‎</span>), compare [[Ps.1.4|Ps 1:4]]; [[Ps.35.5|Ps 35:5]]; [[Hos.13.8|Hos 13:8]] of hostile nations [[Isa.17.13|Isa 17:13]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span>), [[Isa.29.5|Isa 29:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָבָק דַּךְ‎</span>); hyperb. of Judah's power, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּבָעוֺת כַּמֹץ תָּשִׂים‎</span> [[Isa.41.16|Isa 41:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרִים וְתָדֹק תָּדוּשׁ‎</span>); of passing time, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם‎</span> [[Zeph.2.2|Zeph 2:2]]. I, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺצָא‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺצָאָה‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יצא‎</span>.I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּצָק‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּצֶ֫קֶת‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יצק‎</span>. II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּצָק‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוק‎</span>.
